formattedAddress: 103 Canal St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
On Sunday December 17, 2023 I purchased a one way bus ticket from Wanda coach bus company for the amount of 123.99 for myself from Atlanta Georgia to New York City, for departure Tuesday December 19, 2023 at 1:30pm. Upon arrival to the pick up location the bus was already leaving at 1:25pm and I was left behind to catch the next bus which was set to depart at 4pm, but was told by a Wanda coach employee that I would have to pay $15 extra to board because I missed the first bus which left before the advertised departure time. Upon boarding the 4pm bus I noticed a strong stench of urine and feces. On the bus there is a bathroom and the toilet was filled to the brim with urine, feces and I don’t know what else just swishing splashing around in the overflowing toilet. The bus itself was very dusty and dirty and has no air circulation to let out the bad air. Also this company transports cigarettes along with other illegal goods from Georgia and along the route to NYC and forces customers on the bus to go inside gas stations and buy cartons of cigarettes to sell in NYC which isn’t taxed. I am asking that this company be investigated for not providing a clean and safe bus for customers who are traveling long distances without proper inspection along with safety and health concerns. I am asking to have the buses sanitized and inspected including the bathroom before and after each trip. Also to make sure every person is accounted for before leaving after each break stop. Because they have left people stranded in different cities in dark and unsafe locations if they don’t get back on the bus whenever the driver is ready. They will leave people in parts of towns they probably never even been in before which isn’t safe. People luggage have come up missing or stolen on the bus, people have been assaulted, buses have broken down many time with multiple passengers on board due to buses not being up to date in maintenance and inspections. Pls investigate this company that are doing a lot of shady stuff because they know it’s hard to make complaints against them so they do whatever and treat customers however which isn’t right and definitely not professional.

My complaint doesn’t stop here, I will be going through any means to bring this company down. I am in the process of making a formal complaint with the DOT as well as the news to bring awareness to this shady business

originalText.text:
Taking a Wanda Coach from Indianapolis to New York was like starring in my own budget-friendly road movie – minus the high-speed car chases, of course. Let's get real: you get exactly what you pay for. Was the bus as clean as a 5-star hotel room? Not quite. But did it get me to my destination without emptying my wallet? Absolutely.

The journey was spiced up with a couple of bathroom breaks – trust me, using the roadside facilities is a strategic move to preserve the olfactory sanctity of the bus. We also had a pit stop to switch drivers, which was smoother than a slick scene transition.

The drivers? They were the unsung heroes of my trip, navigating the road with the precision and speed of seasoned pros. Thanks to them, I arrived a whopping hour and a half early, giving me extra time to ponder whether I should spend my savings on a fancy New York dinner or just invest in a good book for the return trip. All in all, Wanda Coach delivered a no-frills, value-packed adventure that left both my wallet and my wanderlust satisfied.

originalText.text:
Subject: Concerning Incident Involving Bus Driver - Urgent Safety Matter

I wish to bring to your attention a disconcerting incident that transpired today, 9/8/23, at approximately at 5:45 pm. While traveling with my daughter and getting on NJ Turnpike North, our vehicle encountered a potentially hazardous situation involving one of your buses near the exit.

To my great alarm, the bus abruptly maneuvered in front of our vehicle, thereby sandwiching us between the bus and several other automobiles. The resulting anxiety and peril were palpable. In an attempt to avert a possible catastrophe, I resorted to incessant horn honking to gain the attention of the bus driver and prevent harm.

I find it imperative to underscore the gravity of this incident and the evident recklessness displayed by this bus driver. Such conduct endangers lives on the road and warrants immediate attention.

Without hesitation, I reached out to your company's customer service to formally register my complaint. I eagerly await your prompt response and resolution of this pressing safety issue. It is of utmost importance that measures are taken to ensure the safety of all road users under your service.

Sincerely,
V -

originalText.text: DO NOT CHOOSE THIS BUS SERVICE THEY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY AND WONT REFUND BY ANY MEANS!  I had a round trip bus trip scheduled a few days before Christmas and I chose Wanda coach because of how cheap the cost was. Should have known cheaper wasn’t better. First off they tell you the pick up area is at a gas station. So there is no one or no representative you could talk to on site. Then they sent me a text saying my bus was canceled literally an hour before it’s supposed to leave. I called the number in the text and the representative told me they had no idea why the bus canceled and that I had to call a different number In the morning for a reschedule or refund. I called that same number again trying to figure out what happened to the bus and they told me something completely different. I did not want to reschedule the trip I just wanted my refund because this seemed very skeptical. I called the other number the representative told me to call and that person on that line told me they could not do a refund over the phone it had to be through email, which I thought wasn’t professional. So I emailed them and they only refunded me the money to my destination but not coming back from my destination. So I lost $100+ that I can’t get back because the bus coming back wasn’t “cancelled”… I didn’t understand why I couldn’t get a full refund even though it was a round ticket. If I couldn’t get to point b then how did they think I was going to get back from point b to point A. I’m very disappointed with this service and I really do hope they disappear completely. THEY LOVE STEALING YOUR MONEY

originalText.text: If there was no star review, I would have given that. Worst service I have seen. I booked the bus ticket from Washington DC to NYC at 2:30 AM. I waited there till 6:30 AM but the bus didn't show up. There was no bus tracking service. No contact number to contact the driver/office. Even if I were able to get their number from the internet, it ended up at voice mail. After all these, when I looked at their refund policy, this is what they have mentioned. "Wanda Coach, on occasions, cancel or change bus schedule to maintain high safety standards. Bus tickets cannot be refunded, but they can be rescheduled." DON'T EVER BOOK TICKET IN THIS BUS CARRIER.
